Title: Relates to the definition of the term name for purposes of designating or nominating a candidate for public office or party position
Summary: Relates to the definition of the term "name" for purposes of designating or nominating a candidate for public office or party position.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to directing that the use of a candidate's alternate, familiar or anglicized name is permissible on electoral nominating petitions and ballots
